    M6 - Seasonal ARIMA Models

    Learning Objectives

    The learning goals for this module are:

    • Discuss the seasonal ARIMA model (SARIMA);
    • Learn how to idenfy order of seasonal component;
    • Learn how to fit seasonal ARIMA models in R.

    Slides

    Here is a link to the slide deck used in class.

    Resources

    • Time Series Analysis with Applications - Cryer and Shan - Chapter 6: Models Specification

    • Time Series Analysis with Applications - Cryer and Shan - Chapter 10: Seasonal Models

    Recordings

    Here you will also find some helpful recordings.

    • Concept and components of seasonal ARIMA models - Part 1
    • Concept and components of seasonal ARIMA models - Part 2
    • How to fit SARIMA models using R

    Deliverables

    For this module you will complete Assignment 6. The due date for A6 is March 6.
